text: Aziz Eraltay Behich (, ; born 16 December 1990) is an Australian professional soccer player who plays as a left back and left winger for A-League club Melbourne City and the Australia national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Continental Other Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Melbourne Victory 2009–10 5 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 5 0 Melbourne Heart 2010–11 27 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 27 0 2011–12 24 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 24 1 2012–13 14 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 14 0 Total 65 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 65 1 Bursaspor 2012–13 1 0 1 0 0 0 0 0 2 0 2014–15 29 0 8 0 2 0 0 0 39 0 2015–16 26 1 5 0 0 0 1 0 32 1 2016–17 32 0 2 0 0 0 0 0 34 0 2017–18 31 5 3 0 0 0 0 0 34 5 2018–19 3 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 3 0 Total 122 6 19 0 2 0 1 0 144 6 Melbourne Heart 2013–14 (loan) 24 1 0 0 0 0 0 0 24 1 PSV Eindhoven 2018–19 4 0 2 0 0 0 0 0 6 0 Career total 220 8 21 0 2 0 1 0 244 8 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Australia 2012 5 2 2013 0 0 2014 3 0 2015 4 0 2016 0 0 2017 7 0 2018 11 0 2019 8 0 2021 5 0 Total 43 2 :Scores and results list Australia's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Behich goal.
